definition: Arrange, Act, Assert - testing pattern for structuring test cases
fullDefinition: AAA: Arrange, Act, Assert - testing pattern for structuring test cases
API: Application Programming Interface
AWS: Amazon Web Services
BaaS: Backend as a Service

definition: Behavior-Driven Development - software development approach focusing on behavior specifications
fullDefinition: BDD: Behavior-Driven Development - software development approach focusing on behavior specifications
CI/CD: Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment
CSS: Cascading Style Sheets
DOM: Document Object Model
Docusaurus: Static site generator for documentation

definition: Google's mobile and web application development platform
fullDefinition: Firebase: Google's mobile and web application development platform
Git: Distributed version control system

definition: Web-based hosting service for Git repositories
fullDefinition: GitHub: Web-based hosting service for Git repositories
HTML: HyperText Markup Language
JavaScript: Programming language for web development
JSON: JavaScript Object Notation

definition: Microsoft's software framework for building various types of applications
fullDefinition: .NET: Microsoft's software framework for building various types of applications
Node.js: JavaScript runtime environment
npm: Node Package Manager

definition: JavaScript library for building user interfaces
fullDefinition: React: JavaScript library for building user interfaces
REST: Representational State Transfer
SQL: Structured Query Language
SSR: Server-Side Rendering
TypeScript: Typed superset of JavaScript

definition: User Interface - the means by which a user interacts with a computer system
fullDefinition: UI: User Interface - the means by which a user interacts with a computer system
VS Code: Visual Studio Code editor

definition: eXtensible Markup Language - markup language for encoding documents in a format readable by both humans and machines
fullDefinition: XML: eXtensible Markup Language - markup language for encoding documents in a format readable by both humans and machines

definition: Properties passed to React components to customize their behavior and appearance
fullDefinition: Props: Properties passed to React components to customize their behavior and appearance

definition: React hook for adding state management to functional components
fullDefinition: useState: React hook for adding state management to functional components

definition: React hook for performing side effects in functional components (like data fetching, subscriptions, or DOM manipulation)
fullDefinition: useEffect: React hook for performing side effects in functional components (like data fetching, subscriptions, or DOM manipulation)

definition: React hook for consuming context values in functional components
fullDefinition: useContext: React hook for consuming context values in functional components

definition: React hook for managing complex state logic using a reducer function
fullDefinition: useReducer: React hook for managing complex state logic using a reducer function

definition: JavaScript XML - syntax extension for JavaScript used in React for describing UI structure
fullDefinition: JSX: JavaScript XML - syntax extension for JavaScript used in React for describing UI structure

definition: Process of converting source code into executable software
fullDefinition: Build: Process of converting source code into executable software

definition: Process of making software available for use
fullDefinition: Deploy: Process of making software available for use

definition: Process of checking code for potential errors and style issues
fullDefinition: Lint: Process of checking code for potential errors and style issues

definition: Process of restructuring code without changing its functionality
fullDefinition: Refactor: Process of restructuring code without changing its functionality

definition: Test-Driven Development - software development approach where tests are written before code
fullDefinition: TDD: Test-Driven Development - software development approach where tests are written before code

definition: Independent line of development in Git
fullDefinition: Branch: Independent line of development in Git
Commit: Snapshot of changes in Git
Merge: Combining changes from different branches

definition: Request to merge changes from one branch to another
fullDefinition: Pull Request: Request to merge changes from one branch to another
